createRoom.title: Create a Room
createRoom.description: This API lets you create unique meetingId.

postParameters.description: #### Using this body parameter, you can host the room on a nearby server, which improves call quality. If you don't pass this body param, your room will be hosted on Singapore servers by default.
#### Customize Room id for better understanding.

#### You can subscribe from various events to get webhook. 
 - `participant-joined` 
 - `participant-left` 
 - `session-started` 
 - `session-ended` 
 - `recording-started` 
 - `recording-stopped` 
 - `livestream-started` 
 - `livestream-stopped` 
 - `hls-started` 
 - `hls-stopped` - 
 Please refer this [User webhooks](/api-reference/realtime-communication/user-webhooks) for more information. All User webhooks endpoint must me a `POST` method in your api server / webhook server.
